How to Use

  • Click anywhere on this page to focus it
  • Press and hold any key - it will send continuously while held
  • Release the key to stop sending
  • Press 'q' to quit the publisher
  • Multiple keys can be held simultaneously
  • Real-time updates via Server-Sent Events (SSE)

Press and hold any key...

Manual Key Input

Batch Key Input

REST API Endpoints

  • GET /api/status - Get server status
  • POST /api/key - Send single key (with held state)
  • POST /api/key/down - Key press down event
  • POST /api/key/up - Key release up event
  • POST /api/keys/batch - Send multiple keys
  • GET /api/events - Server-Sent Events stream
